tool_description: Validates payment methods, verifies billing information, and checks payment processing capabilities.

payment_method_type.description: Type of payment method: credit_card, debit_card, paypal, bank_transfer, digital_wallet

expiry_date.description: Card expiration date in MM/YY format

test_amount.description: Small amount to test payment method (usually $0.01-1.00)

error_messages: Invalid payment method type: Use one of [credit_card, debit_card, paypal, bank_transfer, digital_wallet].
Card validation failed: The card number or expiry date is invalid.
Billing address mismatch: The provided billing zip does not match card records.
Payment method expired: The payment method has expired and needs updating.
Test transaction failed: The payment method failed validation testing.
usage: Specify payment_method_type and provide relevant validation parameters based on the payment type. The tool will verify the payment method's validity.

is_valid.description: Whether the payment method passed validation

validation_code.description: Validation result code from payment processor

last_four_digits.description: Last four digits of the payment method
